game.name: Synthetic Lover
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the future a biot working as a companion and without free will, encounters a device that makes him feel human. Self-discovery, hardships, and romance may follow. A BL/Yaoi visual novel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the future a biot working as a companion and without free will, encounters a device that makes him feel human. Self-discovery, hardships, and romance may follow. A BL/Yaoi visual novel.
